meaning: The mayor inaugurated the new park.
example: inaugurate'는 (공식적인 행사와 함께) (새로운 서비스, 건물, 정책 등을) '시작'하거나, (지도자를) '취임시킨다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The CEO will inaugurate the company's new headquarters tomorrow.
sentence: The city will ____ a new public library this weekend.

meaning: The design incorporates new ideas into the product.
example: incorporate'는 (어떤 요소를) (기존의 것에) '일부로' '포함'하거나 '통합시킨다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We plan to incorporate customer feedback into the next product update.
sentence: We plan to ____ your ideas into the final report.

example: incur'는 (주로 좋지 않은 결과, 즉 비용, 손실, 벌금 등을) '자신이' '겪게' 되거나 '초래한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n You may incur additional fees for late payments.
sentence: His mistake may ____ extra costs for the team.

meaning: The data indicate that sales increased.
example: indicate'는 (데이터나 사실이) (특정 상황을) '보여주거나' '나타낸다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The survey results indicate a high level of customer loyalty.
sentence: The results clearly ____ a rise in customer interest.

meaning: Please inform us of any changes.
example: inform'은 (필요한 정보나 사실을) (누군가에게) '공식적으로' '알린다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We will inform all applicants of our decision by email.
sentence: Please ____ the staff of any schedule changes.

meaning: The team initiated the project last year.
example: initiate'는 (어떤 일이나 과정을) '공식적으로' '처음 시작'하거나 '착수한다'는 의미의 동사입니다. (start/begin보다 격식 있음)\r\n The company has decided to initiate a new wellness program for employees.
sentence: The company will ____ a new training program.

example: inquire'는 (정보를 얻기 위해) '공식적으로' '질문'하거나 '문의한다'는 의미의 동사입니다. (ask보다 격식 있음)\r\n I am writing to inquire about the status of my recent order.
sentence: May I ____ about the shipping time?

meaning: Please insert your card into the slot.
example: insert'는 (어떤 것을) (다른 것의 안이나 틈새로) '끼워 넣는다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Please insert your credit card into the machine.
sentence: Please ____ your card into the slot.

example: inspect'는 (안전, 품질, 규정 준수 여부 등을) '자세히' '검사'하거나 '점검한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n An auditor will arrive next week to inspect our financial records.
sentence: Engineers must ____ the machine before use.

example: inspire'는 (누군가에게) (어떤 일을 하도록) '열의'나 '영감'을 불어넣는다는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The manager's speech inspired the team to achieve their goals.
sentence: Her story will ____ others to follow their dreams.

example: institute'는 (명사) '연구'나 '교육' 등을 위한 '전문 기관'이나 '협회'를 의미합니다. (동사로 '제도를 도입하다'는 뜻도 있음)\r\n The research institute will publish its findings next month.
sentence: The school will ____ new safety rules this semester.

meaning: The teacher instructed students to follow the rules.
example: instruct'는 (지식이나 기술을) '가르치다'는 의미도 있지만, (누군가에게) (무엇을 하라고) '공식적으로' '지시한다'는 의미로도 자주 쓰입니다.\r\n The manager instructed the staff to complete the report by Friday.
sentence: He will ____ you to follow the proper steps.

example: intend'는 (~할) '목적'이나 '계획'을 갖는다는 의미의 동사이며, (주로 'be intended for' 형태로) '특정 대상을 위해' 만들어졌음을 나타냅니다.\r\n The seminar is intended for employees in management positions.
sentence: We ____ to finish this project by Friday.

example: interpret'는 (데이터나 정보의) '의미를' '설명'하거나 '해석하다', 혹은 (외국어를) '통역한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We need someone who can interpret the results of the data analysis.
sentence: Can you ____ what the data means?

example: interrupt'는 (진행 중인 말이나 행동, 서비스 등을) '중간에' '가로막거나' '방해하여' '중단시킨다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We apologize for the service interruption due to the storm.
sentence: Sorry to ____ your meeting, but it’s urgent.

meaning: Let me introduce my friend to you.
example: introduce'는 (사람을) '소개하다'는 의미 외에, (신제품이나 새로운 시스템을) '시장에' '내놓거나(출시하다)' '도입한다'는 의미로 쓰입니다.\r\n Next quarter. we plan to introduce a new software update.
sentence: Let me ____ you to our new manager.

example: invent'는 (상상력과 실험을 통해) (유용한 장치나 과정 등을) '처음으로' '만들어내거나' '발명한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Our research department invented a new. more efficient manufacturing process.
sentence: Edison helped ____ the electric light bulb.

example: invest'는 (미래의 수익을 기대하고) (돈이나 시간을) '특정 사업이나 자산에' '투입'하거나 '투자한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The firm decided to invest heavily in new technology.
sentence: They decided to ____ more money in research.

example: investigate'는 (문제, 불만, 사고 등의) '원인이나' '사실을' '밝히기' '위해' '면밀히' '조사한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The committee was formed to investigate the cause of the accident.
sentence: The police will ____ the cause of the fire.

example: involve'는 (어떤 일이나 활동의) '필수적인' '부분'으로 '포함'하거나 '수반한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The position involves managing a team of ten employees.
sentence: This role will ____ working closely with clients.

example: issue'는 (명사) '논의되거나' '해결해야' '할' '중요한' '문제'나 '사안'을 의미합니다. (동사로 '발급하다', 명사로 '잡지의 호'라는 뜻도 있음)\r\n We need to address the issue of low employee morale.
sentence: We will ____ a new ID card for each employee.

example: jeopardize'는 (중요한 일이나 계획을) '위험'에 빠뜨리거나 '위태롭게' 만든다는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Any delay now could jeopardize the success of the entire project.
sentence: Late payments could ____ your credit score.

meaning: She joined the company. / He joined in the discussion.
example: join'은 (회사, 팀, 조직 등에) '일원으로' '합류'하거나 '가입한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Ms. Hanson will join our team as the new head of marketing.
sentence: Would you like to ____ our sports club?

example: justify'는 (어떤 행동, 결정, 비용 등이) '정당'하거나 '이유가' '있음'을 '보여준다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n You must provide receipts to justify all your travel expenses.
sentence: He tried to ____ his decision with strong reasons.

meaning: The company launched a new product.
example: launch'는 (새로운 제품이나 서비스, 캠페인 등을) '시장에' '내놓거나' '시작한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The company is preparing to launch a new line of products next month.
sentence: They plan to ____ a new product next month.

example: lead'는 (팀, 프로젝트, 회의 등을) '앞장서서' '이끈다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Mr. Chen will lead the new software development project.
sentence: Good leaders always ____ by example.

meaning: We learned English. / I learned to swim.
example: learn'은 (공부나 경험을 통해) (지식, 기술, 정보 등을) '습득'하거나 '알게 된다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n All employees are required to learn how to use the new software.
sentence: We can ____ a lot from past mistakes.

meaning: He left the office for lunch.
example: leave'는 (어떤 장소를) '떠나다'는 의미, 혹은 (어떤 장소에) (물건이나 메시지를) '두고' '가거나' '남긴다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Please leave the package at the reception desk.
sentence: She decided to ____ the company after ten years.

meaning: The new policy lessened the burden. / The pain lessened over time.
example: lessen'은 (양, 정도, 중요성 등을) '줄이거나' '줄어들게' 만든다는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The new procedures should help lessen the workload for the team.
sentence: Exercise can ____ your stress levels.

example: lie'는 (눕다, 거짓말하다) 외에, (어떤 장소에) '특정하게' '위치해' '있다'는 의미로도 쓰이는 동사입니다.\r\n (The factory lies just outside the city limits.)
sentence: The main problem may ____ in poor planning.

example: list'는 (특정 순서로 나열된) '항목'들의 '목록'이나 '명단'을 의미하는 명사입니다.\r\n Please refer to the list of approved vendors.
sentence: Please ____ your name on the attendance sheet.

meaning: They loaded the boxes onto the truck.
example: load'는 (명사) '한' '번에' '운반'할 '수' '있는' '짐'이나 '화물'의 '양'을 '의미'합니다.\r\n The truck is carrying a full load of building materials.
sentence: Let’s ____ the boxes into the truck.

example: local'은 '특정' '지역'이나 '현지'에 '관련'되거나 '특징'을 '가진' '것'을 '의미'하는 '형용사'입니다.\r\n We always try to purchase supplies from local businesses.
sentence: We prefer to hire ____ workers for local projects.

meaning: She looked at him. / He looked for his key.
example: look'는 (시각적으로) '보다'는 의미 외에, (주로 'look for' 형태로) (필요한 것이나 사람을) '찾는다'는 의미로 자주 쓰입니다.\r\n We are looking for a candidate with strong communication skills.
sentence: Please ____ into this matter carefully.

example: lower'는 (가격, 수준, 양 등을) '더' '적거나' '낮은' '상태'로 '만들다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다. (제공된 '얼굴을 찡그리다'는 뜻은 토익에서 거의 쓰이지 않습니다.)\r\n The company decided to lower the price of its older models.
sentence: We must ____ costs without reducing quality.
